website_summaries.verdict: An Amazon exclusive toy that's well made and compatible with other Hot Wheels figures.
pros: Car design based on the Spider-Man Homecoming movie
Included web car shoots out from the large red vehicle
When pressing down, the car windows blink like eyes
cons: Some wish the web car would shoot out farther and faster

website_summaries.verdict: Kids will love the chunky Spider-Man car for its size alone, but this sturdy mega-car will give Hot Wheels collectors extra value as they test which cars will fit the launcher.
pros: Spider-Man car’s windshield eyes narrow and it launches a smaller web car when you press its spoiler
cons: Spidey doesn’t launch cars with the force you’d expect

customer_reviews.title: Super cool car!!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth buying..super cool and my son loved it.. my son bring it with him anywhere he go..
customer_reviews.author: Donna Webster

customer_reviews.title: Toy Review
customer_reviews.text: The little car does not launch with much velocity. My 5-year old got bored quickly and he's a Spider-Man fan. No problems with the provider. I jus wouldn't recommend this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia copeland

customer_reviews.title: Nephew Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: Nephew Loves It! He couldn't have been more thrilled. As an adult I wish the car shot farther, and that you could buy more of the white "Web" cars, but it's great you can use most of the hot wheelz line up (pending size). But ffrom a kids view point... it's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: The little car doesn't come out very fast but they seem to love it. When you press down the windows blink ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this car for my 4 year old son and 6 year old nephew. The little car doesn't come out very fast but they seem to love it. When you press down the windows blink like eyes - the youngest one especially liked this.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for spiderman fan
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew for his birthday and it was much cheaper on Amazon than in stores. It is very durable and a huge hit for a 6 year old spiderman fanatic.
customer_reviews.author: Hansen Family

customer_reviews.title: This is an almost perfect gift for kids that love Spiderman and Cars
customer_reviews.text: This is an almost perfect gift for kids that love Spiderman and Cars, and it was a hit with my son. My only issue is that I expected much more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: gary reed

customer_reviews.title: It connects to Hotwheel tracks.
customer_reviews.text: Not listed in the product description is that the front bumper connects to Hotwheel tracks which makes the ejected car go faster, farther, and allows you to connect the car to other Hotwheel sets.
customer_reviews.author: buster_roo

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: What a fun toy! My grandson loves racing the car around the floor and shooting out the surprise mini car! He's had hours and hours of fun with this toy!
customer_reviews.author: CidyLouWho

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas as he really wanted a transforming car. This thing is total junk. You can't get to the charging port without using a screw driver to remove the battery case, it run through a battery charge in minutes, it was all but falling apart right out of the box. Just junk.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: More like scoots. Doesn't go to far
customer_reviews.text: Car doesn't really launch out of there. More like scoots. Doesn't go to far. Other than that its a good toy but pricey for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Hernandez family

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun concept but the execution is lacking. The little cars don’t lock into place when you put them into the large red one. Most often they’ll start rolling back out again before you’ve “pulled the trigger” to launch. The kids still like it, but it could launch the cars much better/further if the small ones would lock into place first
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Lightning speed and fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Great product my nephew loved it, contrary to other reviews that I have seen the car actually does shoot out the hot wheels. not for sure if there's a defect with the other models but my nephew's cars flew across the room like lightning. He enjoys playing with they all day long great product will definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Jessie

customer_reviews.title: MY NEPHEW HATED IT
customer_reviews.text: LOL, I WRAPPED THIS AS A GIFT AND DIDN'T THINK MUCH OF IT BUT WHEN MY NEPHEW OPENED IT IT WAS HILARIOUS. HE WAS SO DISAPPOINTED & I SAW WHY WHEN HE STARTED TO PLAY WITH IT, NO BUENO!!
customer_reviews.author: paul lerma

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I had this on my list for my little guy for 2 years before I finally bought it. The cars don't shoot out as well as I thought, but my little guy loves it and that's all that matters! It is a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Well made, larger than I expected and shoots a hot wheels Spiderman sports car out of the front by pressing down on the tail fin. A feature I didn't expect but made the Spiderman sports car more fun for the kids. Very nice and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JSW

customer_reviews.title: Best toy EVER!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this toy!! It’s hands down one of his favorite toys! I don’t think you could ever go wrong with this one! It’s been through war with that kid and yet it’s still as sturdy as ever!!
customer_reviews.author: VegasStrong26

customer_reviews.title: Everything he wanted
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old and he flipped out from joy when he saw it. Tue car shooting is a little slower than I expected but as long as he loves it that is all that matters. colors were broght and perfect for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Maria W. Spiegelberg

customer_reviews.title: Spiderman Marvel Hot wheels
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 1/2 year old grandson figured out how to put the matchbox car in the mouth of the larger car and hit the spoiler to shoot the matchbox car out. He was so excited. We were still reading the box. We all felt that the car shot out quick enough and far enough for him.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Farrrer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a Christmas gift for my 3 year old grandson but it's a really nice toy! I purchased the spiderman car and he's going to love it. It's made well & looks exactly as pictured! The price was great too at just under $20!
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a 5 year old that loves Spider-Man. He absolutely loved the car and opened it up on the spot. He played with it for the rest of his birthday party with the other kiddos. Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Bondra

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: This car made a great gift for my nephew. He loved it. The only con with this is that the smaller car inside does not really shoot out very fast. That really didn't seem to matter to my nephew though. It makes a great gift for anyone who likes Spider Man.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy grandson
customer_reviews.text: A toy that works without batteries! Grandson had fun playing with this. Wish it had a little more "oomph" when the car gets pushed out, but still happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: chips627

customer_reviews.title: Great fifth-birthday present for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: My five-year-old grandson was thrilled with this toy, which was a birthday present to him. He’d been asking for it for months, so it was a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Marjieoc

customer_reviews.title: Dope toy!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 4 yr old to hit other cars with

customer_reviews.title: does not launch the small car like it should
customer_reviews.text: Car looks good, cheaply made, but it does not launch the small car like it should, not worth what we paid for the car

customer_reviews.title: Fun and sturdy

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!

customer_reviews.title: Grandson's pick

customer_reviews.title: Spiderman car

product_meta.title: Marvel Hot Wheels Spider-Man Web-Car Launcher
product_meta.description: Speed to your next adventure with our largest Spider-Man Character Car yet! Based on the new suit from the Spider-Man: Homecoming movie, this car's windshield moves with a push of the spoiler to focus in on his target. The spoiler also launches the included exclusive web car (or most Hot Wheels cars) to take down villains or other obstacles. Race to the scene of the crime! Push down on spoiler to launch the Spider-Man web car at villains to take them down. Launch other super hero cars, too. Push down the spoiler to make Spider-Man's eyes change size so he can focus and aim.
feature_bullets: Speed to your next adventure with our largest Spider-Man Character Car yet! Based on the new suit from the Spider-Man: Homecoming movie, this car's windshield moves with a push of the spoiler to focus in on his target.
​ Spoiler also launches the included exclusive web car (or most Hot Wheels cars) to take down villains or other obstacles. Race to the scene of the crime!​

​Push down on spoiler to launch the Spider-Man web car at villains to take them down. Launch other super hero cars, too. Push down the spoiler to make Spider-Man's eyes change size so he can focus and aim.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,320 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
